column3: God saw all that He had made, and it was very good. Evening came and then morning: the sixth day.

column2: Everyone must appear with a gift suited to his means
column3: Everyone must appear with a gift suited to his means, according to the blessing the LORD your God has given you.

column2: So the people said to Joshua
column3: So the people said to Joshua, “We will worship the LORD our God and obey Him.”
Sing to Him; sing praise to Him; tell about all His wonderful works!
When I am afraid, I will trust in You.
I have treasured Your word in my heart so that I may not sin against You.
A good name is to be chosen over great wealth; favor is better than silver and gold.
Then I heard the voice of the Lord saying: Who should I send? Who will go for Us? I said: Here I am. Send me.
I am Yahweh, and there is no other; there is no God but Me. I will strengthen you, though you do not know Me.

“Bring the full tenth into the storehouse so that there may be food in My house. Test Me in this way,” says the LORD of Hosts. “See if I will not open the floodgates of heaven and pour out a blessing for you without measure.”

column2: Go, therefore, and make disciples of all nations
column3: Go, therefore, and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, teaching them to observe everything I have commanded you. And remember, I am with you always, to the end of the age.
And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature, and in favor with God and with people.
For the Son of Man has come to seek and to save the lost.
God is spirit, and those who worship Him must worship in spirit and truth.

column2: By this all people will know
column3: By this all people will know that you are My disciples, if you have love for one another.

column2: There is salvation in no one else
column3: There is salvation in no one else, for there is no other name under heaven given to people, and we must be saved by it.

column2: If you confess with your mouth
column3: If you confess with your mouth, “Jesus is Lord,” and believe in your heart that God raised Him from the dead, you will be saved.
Don’t you yourselves know that you are God’s sanctuary and that the Spirit of God lives in you?

column2: For you are saved by grace
column3: For you are saved by grace through faith, and this is not from yourselves; it is God’s gift.
Give thanks in everything, for this is God’s will for you in Christ Jesus.
Let no one despise your youth; instead, you should be an example to the believers in speech, in conduct, in love, in faith, in purity.
Be diligent to present yourself approved to God, a worker who doesn’t need to be ashamed, correctly teaching the word of truth.
But be doers of the word and not hearers only, deceiving yourselves.
Be hospitable to one another without complaining.

column2: And we have this command from Him
column3: And we have this command from Him: The one who loves God must also love his brother.
